messages.becomeManagerText: Nā {username} koe i toko ake hei kaiwhakahaere mō te taiwhanga {studio}
messages.curatorInviteText: Na {actorLink} koe i pōwhiri ki te whakahaere i te taiwhanga {studioLink}. Ki te whakaae ki tēnei pōwhiri, toro atu ki te taiwhanga ki {tabLink}
messages.favoriteText: Na {profileLink} i kaingākau ki tō kaupapa {projectLink}
messages.followText: kei te whai a {profileLink} i a koe ināianei
messages.forumPostText: Kua tukua he kōrero anō ki te aho wānanga: {topicLink}
messages.learnMore: Ki te ako anō, pāwhiritia ki konei
messages.commentReply: Na {profileLink} i whakahoki kōrero ki tō kōrero {commentLink}
messages.projectComment: Na {profileLink} i tuku kōrero mō tō kaupapa {commentLink}
messages.remixText: Na {profileLink} i whakawhenumi i tō kaupapa {remixedProjectLink} hei {projectLink}
messages.scratcherInvite: Kua tokona ake koe hei Scratcher! {learnMore}!
messages.scratchTeamTitle: He karere mai i te Tīma Scratch
messages.studioActivityText: I puta he mahi anō i {studioLink} i te rā nei
messages.studioCommentReply: I whakahokia tō kōrero e {profileLink} i {commentLink}
messages.userJoinText: Nau mai, haere mai ki a Scratch! Ka hanga koe i ngā kaupapa, ka tuhi koe i ngā kōrero, ka puta ai ngā karere kei konei. Haere ki {exploreLink}, {makeProjectLink} rānei.
messages.requestError: Aue! Te āhua nei i raru te kohikohi i ō karere. Whakahoungia tēnei whārangi ki te whakamātau anō.
